---
title: "Load Python script"
output: html_notebook
---

* These chunks work in Linux with RStudio 1.2.1114.

```{r}
# Use this in a Linux installation
reticulate::use_condaenv("anaconda2")
reticulate::py_config()
```

These chunks work under RStudio 1.2.x but not under 1.1.x

```{r}
library(reticulate)
```


```{r}
# import a Python script
# the dot means the current folder
import_from_path("functions_lib", path = ".", convert = TRUE)
```

```{python}
# load function
from functions_lib import sigmoid

print(sigmoid(3))
```

```{python}
import numpy as np
from functions_lib import relu  # load function relu()

x = np.array([
    [0, 3, 4],
    [1, 6, 4]])

print(relu(x))
```
